episode_event_2.5th_anniversary/4001_100:
We’re on the same team today, so let’s make
this exciting!

Yeah! We’re gonna put on the greatest show
anyone’s ever seen!
How did I end up on this team?

Pasio is all about three-on-three battles, isn’t it?
And we’ve got some special opponents for you!

Your retainers insisted on setting up a battle for
you against Dark-type Pokémon users. They also
said they’re not gonna hold back!
Oh, they did?
This isn’t just some ordinary Pokémon battle.

It’s the perfect chance for me to snap a pic of you
and Hoopa in battle!
Hmph. Fine, I’ll allow it.

Hoopa and I are going to show you our coolest
moves out there, so you’d better get some
good shots!

You lot are at the top of your game today, aren’t
you. I guess it’s time for us to unleash our
true power!
Let the winds blow! Stream forward, Sandstorm!
Nice! Show ’em how it’s done, Raihan!
Heheh. All the crowd’s attention is on me now!
Hey! I thought this battle was for ME to show off!
He’s changed the weather.
This is, like, really bad...

Maybe. But we’ve got to keep things exciting even
when we’re in trouble. That’s the golden rule
of entertainment!

Here’s a number I had saved just for this!
Obstagoon, use Obstruct!
Heh. You really brought your A game!

When you give it your all, anything’s possible. That
goes for singing AND Pokémon battles!

Champion! I’m going to take your title right here,
right now!
Are you this passionate at your concerts?

What’s wrong with it? Look! The crowd is going
suuuper wild!
Heh. We’ve got just as much passion as you!

Flygon and I have been battling together since
my Gym Challenge days.
We’ve got twice as strong a bond as anyone!
Hey, Lear! Do you think you can keep up with us?
Are you serious?

Hoopa and I run things here on Pasio! You think
we’re gonna fall behind the likes of you?!
That’s the spirit! All right. Let’s finish this!
Phew. That was a good battle.

You two are pretty strong. Your teamwork wasn’t
half bad, either.

How come you get along so well? Aren’t you
supposed to be rivals?

I’ve battled with Leon tons of times to try to
knock him off his throne. I know all his moves.

The great thing about Pasio is that you can team
up with your friends, your rivals, or...anyone!

Y’know, we could settle our rivalry right here if
you want to!
Oh yeah? Well I’m ready if you are!

Hey! Stop stealing the spotlight, will you? This
event is supposed to be about me, remember?
Thanks for the battle. It really got me fired up.
How did the pictures turn out, by the way?
Perfectly! Here, check this one out!
Wait. You can’t be serious. Just this one picture?

Well, you see... Because of the sandstorm,
most of the pictures didn’t turn out too well...

So I guess it didn’t matter how good our teamwork
was if the sandstorm messed up all the photos.

Hey now, at least we’ll still have the memory
of this awesome battle, right?

Don’t tell me your plan all along was just to get
a cool picture of yourself!

Hehe... Oh, hey! I’ve got an idea! Why don’t we
all take one big group picture together right now?
Good idea, right? OK, everyone stand together!
Hmph. That will do, I guess.
Say “cheese!”
episode_event_2.5th_anniversary/4002_100: OK, it’s our turn now!

We’ve got a super-exciting exhibition match for
you today!

Interesting. Your partner is Therian
Forme Tornadus.

That’s right! He zooms around at 200 miles per
hour, and he’s a real rascal. He’s one of the
Legendary Pokémon of Unova!

He’s the perfect partner for Skyla, the
high-flying girl!
And I’m joined by...
Pelipper, the messenger of the skies!

Our Flying-type Pokémon have the wind at their
backs, and nothing will stop us!
Alola! And alola once again!

Toucannon and I will read the wind—and ride the
wind to victory!

That’s a strong-looking team. And who are
your opponents?
That would be us.

It’s Elesa! Wow, both team leaders are Gym
Leaders from Unova.

That’s right! Elesa is both a supermodel and a 
super Gym Leader!
She’s my number-one bestie!

We may be besties, but don’t think I’m going to
go easy on you, Skyla.

Plus, I’m here today with some teammates who’ve
got my back.

This looks like it’s gonna be a fun battle. Let’s get
this thing started!
Our Electric-type Pokémon will lead us to victory!

We’re rivals today, Elesa! Watch out, ’cause we’re
gonna blow you away!
Right back at ya, sweetie! Here we go!
That looks fun! I wish I could’ve been in the battle!

Oh, such a fierce battle...and yet, their
movements are so polished and so artistic!

If only I’d had the chance to color this battle with
my own palette!

Impressive. I didn’t think you’d be able to keep up
with us.
If we don’t amp it up, we might be in trouble.

This isn’t just a Pokémon battle. It’s also a battle
to see who’s got the most style!

So I’m gonna fly high—and keep flying
higher and higher!

This is the awesomest, most stylish Pokémon
battle that anyone’s ever seen!

Looks like she’s going for much more than just
a win...

Skyla, that is so amazing! I would totally be
cheering for you if we were on the same team!

But today we’re rivals, so I’m gonna put an end
to this!

We lost... You really lived up to your high-flying
nickname, Skyla.

I guess we lost because we couldn’t match
your speed.

They say that Tornadus is much faster in its
Therian Forme than in its Incarnate Forme.
I’ll say. Emolga was completely blown away.

The winds were so fierce, we almost couldn’t
read them!

True, but the crowd was really excited, and most
important of all...
we got to have a real high-flying battle!
Let’s have a rematch soon.
Of course!

Next time, I’m going to let Tornadus go wild and
unleash even more of its power!

Even more than this time? Hmm...I like
your attitude...

but if Tornadus goes even wilder than this, your
teammates and the audience might get blown
away, too!

Instead of the “high-flying girl,” we’ll have to start
calling you the “makes-everyone-fly-away girl!”
That was a thrilling and stylish battle.

I wish it had kept going. It really was a
memorable one!

Thanks so much, Lear! Do you want to battle with
us next?

That’s not a bad idea, but actually, there are
already some other Trainers who want to
challenge you!

I’ll take on anyone’s challenge—anytime,
anyplace!

But this time, I’d love to do it with Elesa on
my team!
episode_event_2.5th_anniversary/4003_100: Dazzling, dizzying, doldrums defying!

Welcome to Lisia’s Miraculous Pokémon
Contest Spectacular!
Are you all having a great time?
All right! This exciting event should be titled...

Emotional and Miraculous Friendiversary
Live Show!

I’ll show you beautiful illusions of water, me, and
my Pokémon!
Whenever and wherever, dance, dance, dance!

Dancing is no challenge for me, because I’m
the best!
Let’s hear everyone cheer!

Lisia really is popular, isn’t she? The crowd is
going wild!
Why don’t you get up onstage, too, May?

I’m just here to help backstage. My turn to shine
is later.

Contest Spectaculars do look like a lot of
fun, though...

Back in Hoenn, I often helped with my father’s
work...but I always wondered what it would be
like to be up onstage...

OK, everyone. Right now, I’m going to scout
today’s fourth contest idol!
And that lucky someone is...
Huh?!
May, get up here onstage with us!
Wh-what?! Me?
She didn’t tell you about this ahead of time?
No! This is completely out of nowhere!

I can’t just go up onstage all of a sudden. Not
with Lisia and all the other talented performers...

Lisia chose you, right? That means you’ve got what
it takes!

I know you’ll be awesome up there together
with Latias!
Brendan...

You’re right. I’ve always wanted to give this
a try.

I’m not going to let this chance pass me by!
I’ll do it!
All right! I’ll be cheering for you!
Will you go up onstage with me, Latias?
OK, let’s go!

Now that all the great contest idols are here
onstage...
Let’s start the performance!

Watching May and the others onstage really
makes you think.

When it comes to Pokémon, being strong
isn’t everything.

Competing to see who’s the cutest or most
beautiful is another great way to build strong
bonds between Pokémon and their Trainers.
Yeah...

May’s always been the type to treasure her bond
with her Pokémon.

To see May onstage being recognized for that,
and to see her have a chance to shine...
It’s awesome!
Yeah, that’s it, Latias! You’re in the groove!

OK, let’s keep going. Now show the crowd
something spectacular!
That was such an amazing Contest Spectacular!

By competing, we brought out the best in each
other and reached even higher dimensions!
It truly was a miraculous performance!

While I was dancing, I couldn’t help but be
captivated by the dances of my rivals!

I made the right choice, scouting you for this
contest, didn’t I?

I was really nervous at first, but little by little,
I got used to it!

It’s all thanks to Latias! She supported me the
whole way through!
She did?

Latias can sense people’s emotions and use
telepathy to communicate her feelings.

She was able to sense what the people in the
audience wanted and passed that on to me.

Wow, that’s amazing! Come to think of it, you and
Latias really were in sync onstage!
Hehehe. Thanks! We had a really good time.
If that’s the case, May...
How about being a contest idol back in Hoenn?
Wh-what?!

How about it? Your performance was wonderful,
and you’ve really got good instincts!
Me? In Hoenn...?

Yeah! I wanna give it a try! It makes me a bit
nervous to think about...

but I really want to learn more about Pokémon
Contest Spectaculars!
And as long as I’m together with Latias, I’ll be OK!
Yaaaay! Another successful scouting!

Did you hear that, everyone? Today, a new contest
idol is born!
I promise I’ll train really hard!

Once I’ve learned the ropes, I’ll be back with
confidence to do more performances!

And when I do, I’ll be looking forward to hearing
your cheers!
episode_event_2.5th_anniversary/4004_100:
Good work. That was a decent-enough event,
I guess.

C’mon, there’s nothing to be embarrassed about!
Just admit it: You had a blast, didn’t you!

Hmph. Well...you’re not wrong. I suppose I’ll
give you that.
But...

If there’s something on your mind, it’s OK to
say it!
*sigh*
I didn’t realize today was our Friendiversary...
I’m really sorry I forgot, Hoopa.

I’ll never forget the day we met for as long as
I live...

and I don’t know how it slipped my mind that
today was the day.
I’m grateful for everything you’ve done!

I would’ve never been able to make things
exciting here on Pasio if it weren’t for you.
So, from here on out...
Oh, young master!

I never knew you were so grateful for our service,
young master! We’ll stay by your side forever!
What are you two doing here?!
Hoopa! Where did Hoopa go?
It called us here and then, like, went away.
Hoopaaaaa!

There they go again. Hard to tell if those two are
friends or enemies sometimes, huh.

But y’know what? Meeting them for the first time
was a good memory for me, too.

I’m not joking. I’m really glad I was able to come
to Pasio.

I couldn’t agree more! I’ve been able to meet so
many sync pairs since I came here.

If it weren’t for Pasio, I probably never would’ve
been able to meet either of you!
I feel the same way. I’m so glad I came to Pasio!
I really treasure the friendships I’ve made here.

I’ll never forget the people or the Pokémon I got
to know on Pasio!
